website_summaries.verdict: Iguanas appreciate a diet loaded with fruits and veggies, and these bite-sized cubes contain plenty of mouthwatering apple and carrot, alongside the essential vitamins, minerals, and protein your large lizard friend needs to thrive.
pros: Water, sucrose, carrageenan (seaweed), whole egg powder, and maltodextrin are the first 5 ingredients
Vitamin and mineral enhanced gel cubes
cons: Uses artificial colorings to get that enticing green hue

customer_reviews.title: My Eguanas Don't Care for It!
customer_reviews.text: We live in South Florida where we are over-run with iguanas. They destroy the foliage in our yard. So, we would prefer to relocate them. We purchased a trap and put this food, along with leafy green veggies that they like, and found that they will eat the leafy green veggies, but do not care for Nature Zone Bites for Iguanas. I have a feeling that iguanas, no matter where they are, pretty much like the same kind of food. Therefore, I can not recommend that you purchase this for your iguanas. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: My baby Iguana took to this with a mixture of greens as soon as I put it in the cage! The only issue I had was one colder piece was lodged in the Iguana's mouth to where I had to get tweezers and pull it out. Quick lesson learned and very easy to cut into smaller pieces. I've had my can for over a month, which is a great buy. I will be buying more once I run out. Just make sure after opening, to put it in the fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Gary 0765Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: but she definitely seems to like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I give this to my iguana regularly and she likes it. She will still go for collard greens first, but she definitely seems to like this stuff. It smells kinda fruity and it has lots of moisture. When she's stressed out she'll tend to ONLY eat this for a week or so. Maybe it's easier on the digestive system?
customer_reviews.author: C. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Iguana eats it better than the other commercial food. I add this to her greens this way she gets all the nutrients she needs.
customer_reviews.author: victoria hampton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent treat to add to my green iguana's food. He loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Smell good. I use them on top of his real grocery store food/garden food. Provides great easy to eat treat for my little green iguana. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Iguanamommy

customer_reviews.title: Lizard like it.
customer_reviews.text: Smell is a bit unusual, but the Iguana loves it. I mix it with the dry food, so it doesn't just it only these bites.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great food, but twice it arrived with seal broken ...
customer_reviews.text: Great food, but twice it arrived with seal broken and food spoiled. How can you tell? The pellets should be a bright lime green like the picture, but instead they were a dark olive green. Would not recommend purchasing this food from this particular vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cannizzaro

customer_reviews.title: Yuck.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give -4 stars I would. 30 iguanas on my dock and embankment. They love me. They are ALL repelled by this crap.
customer_reviews.author: DEEJAYTEE

customer_reviews.title: If she's happy, then I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 feet green iguana loves these little bits I sprinkle on her food. If she's happy, then I'm happy. Keep it in the refrigerator to keep it cold and fresh. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: make sure it is not rotten!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product for my IGGY often. It should be bright green NOT brown. Check to make sure before feeding to your pet......Just received a rotten jar. this stuff spoils when not refrigerated!. Must have gotten one with a bad seal? FYI
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Brown
customer_reviews.text: All was ok until it started arriving a brown color.
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: but they aren't the most nutritious food so I only give her about a small tablespoon of them a day like you would a dessert or t
customer_reviews.text: My Green Iguana LOVES these!! She eats them by the mouthful, and will actively pick them out of her food mix. but they aren't the most nutritious food so I only give her about a small tablespoon of them a day like you would a dessert or treat.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Iguana would rather starve to death than eat this. Had to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Theadora

customer_reviews.title: Zumi the Iguana says Yes
customer_reviews.text: My iguana is a picky eater but devours these. I do add a bit of calcium powder to supplement.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Atkisson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Iggy seems to really like these especially compared to pellet food. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Marie Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my Iguanas and they loved it! They eat all of the portion I ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my Iguanas and they loved it! They eat all of the portion I give them and they're looking great and healthy! They're growing pretty well and always enjoy it with their vegetables. I would recommend this to all iguana owners!
customer_reviews.author: Jr

customer_reviews.title: the very best!
customer_reviews.text: my iguana is fat and healthy - dosent miss her meal with this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Iggy doesn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: Smells like an air freshener. Iggy was not impressed. Didn’t eat much of it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Anne Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Gave these to my iguanas bottle looked fine product wasn't bad a week later I have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my iguanas bottle looked fine product wasn't bad a week later I have a dead iguana not sure if these were the cause but it was the only thing I had changed. Keep a close eye for any changes if feeding this to yours!
customer_reviews.author: shanell davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mine loved it
customer_reviews.text: My iguanas love them they will eat them straight out of the container if I let them too close they like them on top of their food and over all amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Lily🥑

customer_reviews.title: #1 for iguanas!
customer_reviews.text: My iguana (Chappie) loves these over everything I give him. I have given him all the vegetables that are safe for iguanas and he comes running for this when he hears the bottle shaking.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Received product was Brown and no good. A little upset
customer_reviews.text: Received product was Brown and no good. A little upset. Ordered a second one it was good. Had to throw away...
customer_reviews.author: Leah S.

customer_reviews.title: ... put his dish in there plus you get a good amount for the price much bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: My iguana likes this food he wouldn't eat I the first time I introduced it but now he's a little pig when I put his dish in there plus you get a good amount for the price much bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.author: donny trantham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My iguana loves the food. He has stayed healthy the entire time he has at this food. He's quick to come down and eat when ever I put the food it so I assume he likes it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that the iguana would really like this but she didn't respond to it well. Perhaps something else is going on with the iguana, but she didn't eat this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Glen G.

customer_reviews.title: ... several different veggy eating lizard and all of them love this stuff when added to their leave lettice and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several different veggy eating lizard and all of them love this stuff when added to their leave lettice and squish.
customer_reviews.author: Champe G

customer_reviews.title: Iguana Bites
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a problem with the product at all, and from the time I ordered it, I think it was less than 4/5 days that I got it. Kind of a drag they have to be refrigerated, but it was well worth the purchase. My iguana didn't seem to mind them at first, but it has warmed up to them. Overall good purchase choice.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Chops my Iguana loves this treat...will buy again. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes a nice substitute when I am out of fresh greens.
customer_reviews.author: JAN TANNER

customer_reviews.title: she was looking rather scrawny and gave her a little of this couple hours later she looked so much better.
customer_reviews.text: Got for my lil brothers iguana, she was looking rather scrawny and gave her a little of this couple hours later she looked so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Gina W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our iguana loves it and at least adds some moisture to her diet
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Jansen

customer_reviews.title: color was off but appears to be fine
customer_reviews.text: when it arrived the color was a light brown even though it appeared to be tightly sealed. my son and I each tasted a piece to make sure it wasn't spoiled and would be safe for our iggy. Our iggy loves it and digs thru his food to get at the pieces. remember to refrigerate!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Marie

customer_reviews.title: Iguana Bites is a good product that is enjoyed by my iguana as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Iguana Bites is a good product that is enjoyed by my iguana as a supplement to his regular daily diet which consists mostly of fresh fruits and vegetables and clean water. he really seems to think that his bites are a good treat.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Norris

customer_reviews.title: My iguana loves these so I recommend them to anyone who has one
customer_reviews.text: My iguana loves these so I recommend them to anyone who has one. Just remember to add it to food, these are not stand alone foods but added nutrients
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of 4 jars were not sealed properly and already bad upon delivery. Jar 4 is beginning to change color and not opened yet.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hecker

customer_reviews.title: Happy Lizards
customer_reviews.text: My critters love it. The transaction went smooth as silk. I'll be back!
customer_reviews.author: Custodian

customer_reviews.title: These are super helpful and really are a great working product for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are super helpful and really are a great working product for slow eaters, picky eaters or new iguanids in your home**
customer_reviews.author: Erin P.

product_meta.title: Nature Zone Bites For Iguanas, Soft Moist Food, 24-Ounce
product_meta.description: Nature Zone IGB2 Bites for Iguanas are a soft, moist, and ready to eat food designed specifically for Iguanas. Nature Zone IGB2 Bites for Iguanas are made in the USA with the highest quality human grade ingredients. The light Green color and passion fruit flavor and scent, attract iguanas, and keep them eating this healthy vitamin and mineral fortified diet. Nature Zone IGB2 Bites for Iguanas are cut into bite-sized, convenient, ready-to-eat 1/4 inch cubes. The unique iguana formula features isolated whey & soy proteins, which are easily digested and contain amino acids that are critical for growth, soluble plant fiber, for intestinal health, carbohydrates for energy, calcium lactate to help prevent metabolic bone disease (MBD) and a natural, balanced, water to solid ratio that mimics the ripe fruit which iguanas eat. Color or hue may vary. Made in the USA
feature_bullets: Specifically Formulated For Iguanas To Promote Growth &Amp; Health
Ready To Eat - No Pre Soaking Or Pre-Prep Needed
Easily Digested - Isolated Proteins, Soluble Carbohydrates &Amp; Calcium
Also Available In 2 Oz., 9 Oz., &Amp; 1 Gallon Sizes

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
